name: PUT_post
descriptionHtml:
Request:

PUT : https://restful-booker.herokuapp.com/booking/1077

header: 
  "Accept":"application/json"
  "Content-Type":"application/json"
  "Cookie":"token=839151454bff0e0"
  "User-Agent":"PostmanRuntime/7.29.0"
  "Cache-Control":"no-cache"
  "Postman-Token":"c0d50320-4066-4c2b-958f-cd3ab1ef9e38"
  "Host":"restful-booker.herokuapp.com"
  "Accept-Encoding":"gzip, deflate, br"
  "Connection":"keep-alive"
  "Content-Length":"252"

body: 
  {
    "firstname" : "Dimasya",
    "lastname" : "Spirl",
    "totalprice" : 111,
    "depositpaid" : true,
    "bookingdates" : {
        "checkin" : "2022-01-01",
        "checkout" : "2023-02-01"
    },
    "additionalneeds" : "Breakfast"
}

Response:

Code: 200 Status: OK 

   
 
  header:   
  "Server":"Cowboy"
  "Connection":"keep-alive"
  "X-Powered-By":"Express"
  "Content-Type":"application/json; charset=utf-8"
  "Content-Length":"172"
  "Etag":"W/\"ac-6JUCmB1BIEmGZfEqVsHx++JGv4E\""
  "Date":"Thu, 10 Aug 2023 19:53:05 GMT"
  "Via":"1.1 vegur"  
 		 
  
    
 
  body:   
  {
  "firstname":"Dimasya",
  "lastname":"Spirl",
  "totalprice":111,
  "depositpaid":true,
  "bookingdates":{
    "checkin":"2022-01-01",
    "checkout":"2023-02-01"
  },
  "additionalneeds":"Breakfast"
}
